member.name: WINHTTP_SECURITY_INFO
member.summary: The WINHTTP_SECURITY_INFO structure contains the SChannel connection and cipher information for a request.

member.name: WINHTTP_SECURITY_INFO.ConnectionInfo
member.summary: containing the SChannel connection information for the request.

member.name: WINHTTP_SECURITY_INFO.CipherInfo
member.summary: containing the SChannel cipher information for the request.
